channel.title: blog on nukelet's digital garden
channel.description: Recent content in blog on nukelet's digital garden

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: This is my first blog post. Hooray! I’m still not sure what’s to become of this little webspace I’ve created for myself. At the moment, I’m enjoying the process of setting up the cloud infrastructure for hosting it (sometimes it’s good to take joy in the simple things, I think). It’s built with Hugo and packaged with Nix; a blog post about that should be coming soon. Special thanks to Jan Raasch for creating this Bearblog-inspired theme!
